scripts.linux-build: npm run init-dist; npm run angular; tsc
scripts.linux-start: npm run init-dist; npm run angular; tsc; node dist/index.js
scripts.start: npm run backup & ng build & tsc & npm run apply-backup & node ./dist/index.js
scripts.node: npm run backup & tsc & npm run apply-backup & cls & node dist/index.js
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -f src/public/music/* dist/public/music & copyfiles -f src/public/thumbnail/* dist/public/thumbnail
scripts.backup: copyfiles -f dist/public/music/* backup/music & copyfiles -f dist/public/thumbnail/* backup/thumbnail & rd /s /q dist
scripts.apply-backup: copyfiles -f backup/music/* dist/public/music & copyfiles -f backup/thumbnail/* dist/public/thumbnail
scripts.linux-init-dist: sudo rm -f dist/*; sudo rm -r dist/controllers; sudo rm -r dist/models; sudo rm -r dist/objects; sudo rm -r dist/routes; sudo rm -r dist/scripts; sudo rm -r dist/public/angular
